sentences.en: A business entity shall purchase annuity insurance from single insurer.
sentences.cn: 事业单位以向一保险人投保为限.
亚历山大获得了一份数额不大的年金.

sentences.en: Give a man an annuity and he'll live for ever.
sentences.cn: 给人年金,他就会长命百岁.

sentences.en: He received a paltry annuity of $100.
sentences.cn: 他收到了微不足道的100美元年金。

sentences.en: His retirement fund was set up to be paid as an annuity.
In the meantime, encourage build enterprise annuity and individual deposIt'sex endowment insurance.
sentences.cn: 同时, 鼓励建立企业年金和个人储蓄性养老保险.

sentences.en: Investors should consider putting some money into an annuity.
sentences.cn: 投资者们应当考虑存一些年金。

sentences.en: My pension has plummeted and now I have to buy an annuity.
sentences.cn: 我的退休金暴跌,现在必须去买一份年金(annuity)了.

sentences.en: One that receives or is qualified to receive an annuity.
sentences.cn: 相信您一定能从中得到无穷的享受.

sentences.en: Rent payable in advance constitutes an annuity in advance for the landlord.
sentences.cn: 对房东来说,预付租金构成了先期年金.

sentences.en: The corporate mode is the excellent management of enterprise annuity mode.
sentences.cn: 法人受托模式是企业年金管理的优良模式.

sentences.en: The enterprise annuity is a kind of enterprise system for employees.
sentences.cn: 企业年金是指企业为员工举办的补充养老保险.

sentences.en: The personal contribution ratio is voluntary in the annuity program.
sentences.cn: 企业年金中个人缴费比例是自愿的.

sentences.en: To buy or to take out on annuity.
sentences.cn: 购买养老金或领取年退休金.

sentences.en: We should command an annuity of 175,000 livres.
sentences.cn: 我们每年就可以有十七万五千里弗任意支配.

sentences.en: Year 1127 Annuity soldiers captured Kaifeng, Hui and chin had been abducted.
sentences.cn: 公元1127年金兵攻陷开封, 徽钦二宗被掳去.

words.tran_cn: 领年金者；领受养老金者
[劳经]年金，养老金；年金保险；年金享受权

trans.tran_cn: 年金，养老金，年金享受权，年金保险投资
trans.tran_en: a fixed amount of money that is paid each year to someone, usually until they die
